thought: To craft black_wool, I need to craft black_dye first. To craft black_dye, I need to place an ink_sac in the crafting grid. The ink_sac is in slot 37, so I will move it to the crafting grid in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1
